text: All set. It's under "more tools" within your Website Pages dashboard.
By the way, if you have a dynamic table, the row `Path` value  is purged on a clone to prevent duplicate paths. It's a feature not a bug!
Good to know. thanks
Would you guys like the ability to shift+select multiple rows and delete/clone those rows?
Very much :)
Also clone a tables structure, while at it :)
As in clone a table but without the rows?
Yes ... so like for currencies
If country in EU use this table else use the other one
Also sticky headers on the columns so when i scroll down to row 1,000 i know what column I am at
Horizontal scroll bar too (for when in mouse mode)
also move the feedback button in the lower right to be a bit higher as it covers the down arrow (or at least did for me)
<@U2PDTMH53> As in smart content for dynamic pages where you can create smart rules that say which underlying table should be applied?
you guys over here making all the right suggestions, thanks!
Yes ... 3 tables same structure different data. One module that based on location for example will load data from one of the tables. (Euro prices for Europe, £ for UK, $ for everyone else)
you couldn't do three separate fields for each price... now that I say this its probably more complex than that
I don’t mind complex and I can manage solving that with one table ... the marketing peps are the ones with the need for separation
Some of the things I want, and probably other developers, are more for the content creators then for us, devs
ahh gotcha
ok great, thank you
